mapper.select: SELECT a.codmag as CodMag, COALESCE(b.DesNegozio,'Fittizio') DesNegozio, a.QtaGiacUmMag FROM Y_ARTICOLI_VARIANTI a LEFT OUTER JOIN Y_NEGOZI_ESHOP b ON a.codmag = b.codMagaz WHERE a.CodBarre = #{barCode} AND a.QtaGiacUmMag > 0
SELECT distinct IndirEmail, coalesce(CodZona,2) CodZona, Cliente FROM Y_FIDELITY_CARDS_ESHOP WHERE IndirEmail is not null and IndirEmail != '' ORDER BY CodZona
